about.title: About
paragraphs: TechParty Faccat is a totally free event and opened to the whole community. It aims to promote technology and knowledge sharing.
The event is indeed to have two presentations per night, those presentations will be performed by experienced professionals in their working fields.
In the last day of TechParty, certificates will be delivered to the ones who registered and attended the event.
